channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: American Airlines’ chief commercial officer makes surprising exit
item.description: Vasu Raja, American Airlines’ chief commercial officer, will depart the company in June, the airline said Tuesday. Word of Raja’s exit comes a week af...

item.title: Southwest shows off new seats, says they have more cushion — not less
